Description:
Why is TypeScript surging in popularity? Idan Gazit explains the "self-reinforcing cycle" where developers choose languages that AI models excel at. Learn why statically typed languages provide the necessary guardrails to keep AI-generated code correct and "on the rails."

#TypeScript #AI #Programming

Title: How AI is shaping your programming language choices
Author: GitHub
